message.body: Text me if you get done and want to do something before you leave!
Cool, I'll let you know. I need to leave Tucson around 5pm but we could get coffee or something before that.
I guess I can't hang out. I drove down with my dad and we'll drive back up to Phoenix soon.
Oh, I didn't know you were with your dad. That's okay! It was nice to see you at all before you left.
Yeah I'm glad we got to hang out. My phone will work in Germany, so you can always text. I could FaceTime you in your iPad from the streets of Germany. =)
